data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna® 182Q Skylane® II Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Cessna® 182Q Skylane® II is a detailed and highly accurate aircraft. This 182Q comes in nine paint schemes across three liveries, multiple different aircraft models and features an accurate virtual cockpit with realistic instruments, superb exterior modelling and exacting flight dynamics.

Features:


  • 3 paint schemes.
  • Regular aircraft variant included - with/without fairings and a mix of both.
  • External dynamic shadows, internal dynamic shadows on VC, normal mapping, specular mapping and bloom lights.
  • Polygon-optimized model for good FPS.
  • IFR certification.
  • Interactive virtual cockpit.
  • Full moving parts: ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps and trim tab.
  • Animated sections: cowl flaps, opening doors, opening pilot’s window and sun visor.
  • Custom 182Q sounds.
  • Fully 3D-modelled pilot animation and cockpit area.
  • Many details as: pitot pressure chamber, antennas, chocks, pitot tube cover, control lock, baggage area.
  • Custom panel and gauges (Includes NAVOMATIC 300A Autopilot).
  • Built-in zoom gauges and digital readout features with realistic light effects on gauges.
  • Similar behaviour compared with the actual airplane, with real weight and balance.
  • Multiple detailed manuals.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

data.legal_notice: Cessna® 182Q Skylane® II is a trademark of Textron Innovations Inc. and is used under license to RailSimulator.com Ltd d/b/a/ Dovetail Games.
